summary: This document contains an agreement between the United States Secret Service and the Central Intelligence Agency concerning presidential protection in the United States. It also includes memorandums for record discussing meetings, trips, and actions.
title: Agreement Between the United States Secret Service and the Central Intelligence Agency Concerning Presidential Protection in the United States
recipient: Deputy Director for Plans, Deputy Director for Intelligence, Deputy Director for Science & Technology, Deputy Director for support
sender: Marshall S. Carter, Lieutenant General, USA, Deputy Director
